Scoffer is the newest daily deals app, but with a difference.

It has been designed to allow businesses and consumers alike to see all the best dining deals in their selected area, completely free of charge!

Unlike many other daily deals companies, Scoffer does not charge the companies for posting deals, which means in turn these companies can post better offers by not having to pay huge fees in doing so.

Scoffer is designed to be simple and hassle free. There is no user account required to view offers, so to get started all you need to do is download the app, enable your device\'s GPS and your\'e ready to go!

Main Features

Save favourites - Scoffer allows you to save favourite companies by tapping the blue star icon. This means all future offers from this company wil be highlighted.

View favourites first - When companies are saved as favourites, there is an option on the settings screen that can be enabled make sure you see these offers first on the list, regardless of distance.

Save last location - You can opt to use the last saved location in the settings screen, Scoffer will save your location and re-use it should you lose signal.

Scoffer was developed originally for a University project by standalone developer Jonathan Neill . The project was a final dissertation to achieve Msc Professional Software Development from Ulster University, Coleraine, Northern Ireland.

The aim of the project was simple - to create a free, easy to use app that has an everyday use case.
